page.title: 13NOTTINGHAM - THE FOREST
page.content:
The Forest is a park used for lots of different things.Every October they hold Goose Fair there, a huge fair which has been held for the last 600 years .They also have exhibitions, circuses and many other events there.
Its called the Forest but it isn't a forest. In the olden days Sherwood Forest started there. It has a BMX course that's just been made, a putting green and bowling greens.
Our school uses it for our games because our field is full of litter and broken glass.I go there to play football and cricket on a big flat bit of grass.
